intake.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the amount of food, drink etc that you take into your body
intake.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Sickness may develop from inadequate fluid intake.
Try to reduce your intake of fat.
intake.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the number of people who join a school, profession etc at a particular time
intake.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: an intake of around 120 students each year
intake.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a tube, pipe etc through which air, gas, or liquid enters a machine
intake.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: a leak on the air intake to the carburettor
